A

AbstractHalResourceLoaderTest - Class in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client
A base class that you can extend if you are implementing your own HalResourceLoader or HttpClientSupport classes.
AbstractHalResourceLoaderTest() - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.AbstractHalResourceLoaderTest
 
ApacheAsyncHttpSupport - Class in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client
An HTTP client implementation to be used with HalResourceLoaderBuilder.withCustomHttpClient(HttpClientSupport) that is using the asynchronous Apache HTTP client to execute requests.
ApacheAsyncHttpSupport() - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheAsyncHttpSupport
Default constructor that can be used if all URIs are fully qualified
ApacheAsyncHttpSupport(URI) - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheAsyncHttpSupport
An alternative constructor that will resolve all paths against the given Base URI
ApacheBlockingHttpSupport - Class in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client
An HTTP client implementation to be used with HalResourceLoaderBuilder.withCustomHttpClient(HttpClientSupport) that is using the synchronous Apache HTTP client to execute requests.
ApacheBlockingHttpSupport() - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheBlockingHttpSupport
Default constructor that can be used if all URIs are fully qualified
ApacheBlockingHttpSupport(URI) - Constructor for class io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.ApacheBlockingHttpSupport
An alternative constructor that will resolve all paths against the given Base URI
